import React, { Component } from 'react' import './navbar.scss' import '../App.scss' import $ from 'jquery'; export class Navbars extends Component { componentDidMount() { $('#icon').on('click', function () { $('ul').toggleClass('show'); }); $('a').on('click', function () { $('a').removeClass('active'); $(this).addClass('active'); }) } render() { return (
  • Home
  • Projects
  • About
) } } export default Navbars
